      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommandGroup
      A CommandGroup is a series of Commands executed in sequence or in parallel.
      class  ControllerCommand
      A command that uses the supplied Controller to move toward the controller's target.
      class  UnmanagedControllerCommand
      A command that will use an unmanaged Controller to move toward the controller's target.
